OnBeforeLoad
ImportUDL
Method.Description: Import a file with location at fileLocation and name as InternalName This file should contain code in UDL format
Method.Implementation:
set status = $$$OK
if $find(fileLocation, ".cls") { set status = ##class(%Compiler.UDL.TextServices).SetTextFromFile($namespace, InternalName, fileLocation) }
else { set file = ##class(%File).%New(fileLocation) return:$$$ISERR(file) file
set status = file.Open() return:$$$ISERR(status) status
set rtn = ##class(%RoutineMgr).%OpenId(InternalName) return:$$$ISERR(rtn) rtn
set status = rtn.Code.CopyFrom(file) return:$$$ISERR(status) status
set status = rtn.%Save() } return status

Method.name: ExportUDL
Method.Description: exports fileName to fileLocation file using UDL format

Method.name: ExportUDLClass
Method.Description: Exports a class to fileLocation with the name of fileName

Method.name: ExportUDLOther
Method.Description: Exports .mac, .int, .dfi files to fileLocation with the name of fileName
Method.Implementation:
set rtn = ##class(%RoutineMgr).%OpenId(fileName)
// write content to file set fileStream = ##class(%FileCharacterStream).%New() set fileStream.Filename = fileLocation
set status = fileStream.CopyFromAndSave(rtn.Code) return:$$$ISERR(status) status
return status

Method.name: GetInternalName
Method.Description: Gets the name of a file at fileLocation
Method.Implementation: set defLocation = $translate(^Sources, "/", "\") set internalName = $translate($extract(fileLocation, $find(fileLocation, defLocation) + 4, *), "\", ".") return internalName

Method.name: TraverseFileTree
Method.Description: Traverses the file tree starting at source control directory

Method.name: CreateFile
Method.Description: Creates new file with the name of internalName which is stored at fileLocation

Method.name: CreateClass
Method.Description: Creates a class with the name of internalName which is stored at fileLocation
Method.Implementation:
set clsDef = ##class(%Dictionary.ClassDefinition).%New() set clsDef.Name = $replace(internalName, ".cls", "") set st = clsDef.%Save() return:$$$ISERR(st) st
set st = ..ImportUDL(internalName, fileLocation) return st

Method.name: CreateDFI
Method.Implementation:
set st = $$$OK try { set stream = ##class(%Stream.FileCharacter).%New() set st = stream.LinkToFile(fileLocation) return:$$$ISERR(st) st
set tDoc = ##class(%DeepSee.UI.FolderItemDocument).%New(internalName) set st = tDoc.ImportFromXML(stream) return:$$$ISERR(st) st
set st = tDoc.Save() return:$$$ISERR(st) st } Catch e { set st = e.AsStatus() } return st

Method.name: CreateOther
Method.Description: Creates .mac, .int, .dfi file with the name of intrernalName which is stored at fileLocation
Method.Implementation:
set fileLocation = $translate(fileLocation, "\", "/") set $piece(internalName, ".", *) = $zconvert($piece(internalName, ".", *), "U")
set file = ##class(%File).%New(fileLocation)
set rtn = ##class(%Routine).%New(internalName) set status = rtn.CopyFrom(file) return:$$$ISERR(status) status
set status = rtn.Save() return:$$$ISERR(status) status
set status = rtn.Compile() return status
